settings.heading: Life Changing Softness In Every Stitch

settings.p: The plushest faux fur fabric, the perfect weight, and therapeutic levels of softness
100% vegan polyester & cruelty free, double hemmed to ensure they last a lifetime, & machine washable
Modern colors, neutral tones, and designs that enhance the look of any room

settings.info: Lola blankets was founded on bringing comfort and encouragement to those in need. Each month we donate our most special blankets to Huntsman Cancer Institute's breast oncology division in hopes of bringing comfort and encouragement to women living with breast cancer.
